name.jp: ガルディアブルードラゴン

description.en: This devoted little dragon flies around and picks up nearby items for its master.
description.ar: This devoted little dragon flies around and picks up nearby items for its master.
description.br: Este pequeno dragão dedicado voa ao redor e coleta itens próximos para seu mestre.
description.cns: 这只忠诚的小飞龙跟到处飞并且为主人捡起附近掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein kleiner Drache, der seinem Herrchen folgt und Gegenstände aufsammelt.
description.fi: This devoted little dragon flies around and picks up nearby items for its master.
description.fil: This devoted little dragon flies around and picks up nearby items for its master.
description.fr: Invoque un adorable dragonnet qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis.
description.id: Naga kecil yang setia ini terbang berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang terdekat untuk tuannya.
description.it: This devoted little dragon flies around and picks up nearby items for its master.
description.jp: ガルディアブルードラゴンを召喚・帰還させることができます。
description.kr: 이 헌신적인 작은 용은 주변을 날며 주인에게 근처의 물건들을 줍습니다.
description.nl: This devoted little dragon flies around and picks up nearby items for its master.
description.pl: This devoted little dragon flies around and picks up nearby items for its master.
description.ru: This devoted little dragon flies around and picks up nearby items for its master.
description.sp: Este pequeño dragón devoto vuela y recoge los objetos cercanos para su dueño.
description.sw: This devoted little dragon flies around and picks up nearby items for its master.
description.th: มังกรน้อยผู้อุทิศตนนี้บินไปรอบ ๆ และหยิบสิ่งของใกล้เคียงมาให้เจ้านาย
description.tw: 這忠誠的小龍飛來飛去，為它的主人撿起附近的道具。
description.vi: Chú rồng nhỏ tận tụy này bay xung quanh và nhặt các vật phẩm gần đó cho chủ nhân của nó.
